title: Any help with identifying this semi serif?
content:
I'm looking for the name of the typeface that is used in the title (so the text that says 'DRIVE') of this mockup poster of the movie [Drive](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018040334/http:/www.empireonline.com/images/uploaded/alternative-drive-poster-2.jpg). Any help would be greatly appreciated.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Screen shot 2013-04-29 at 4.48.33 PM.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018040334/http:/typophile.com/files/Screen%20shot%202013-04-29%20at%204.48.33%20PM.png) | 39.58 KB |
author: Schavuit
